formatted_address: 1, Jalan Eka, Horizon Hills, 79100 Iskandar Puteri, Johor Darul Ta'zim, Malaysia
name: Hiltz Coffee

reviews.text:
Ordered an Americano, but the taste was strange‚Äîhard to describe. I wondered if the coffee machine was properly cleaned. As a coffee lover, this was a first for me, though it might just be my personal preference.

On a positive note, the environment was chill and relaxing, with a pool nearby. Sitting indoors was comfortable and inspiring, especially with the view of the pool water.

We went after rain, it was kind of cosy and chilling. Not many people were in the cafe so we tend to allowed to chill longer time.

The waffle is crispy, however the drinks were soso for me. The hospitality is great and I would come again!

I brought my niece here for her swimming lesson and spotted this little caf√© nearby. The atmosphere is nice, though seating is quite limited since many parents waiting for their kids occupy the tables. I ordered two waffles‚Äîthe classic one was my favorite!

1st time to this cafe in Horizon Hills Poolside Cafe.

The place is nice, however service can be improved.  Our orders took quite awhile to be served.

The Coffee and Croissant set is a steal. Coffee is ok and the Croissant ü•ê is nice!

It is just near the pool so we just came to have a bite before we swim. The food is very nice. They have curry, belgium chocolate, etc. I love the fact you can have 10% discount with membership hhgcc. The interior is very well done and the price is just ok.

vicinity: 1, Jalan Eka, Horizon Hills, Iskandar Puteri
